fat: She doesn't need internet, she's already **W O R L D W I D E .**
She wakes up on BOTH sides of the bed!
She got arrested for carrying ten pounds of CRACK!
When she sat on Walmart, the prices went down!
stupid: She sold her car for *gas money.*
When she heard it was "chili" outside, she went and got a bowl.
She brought a giant spoon to the Super Bowl!
She got tickets to XBOX LIVE.
short: When she smokes weed, she can't even get high!!
hairy: She stars in Donkey Kong games!
ugly: When she played GTA V, she got an instant 5 stars! ...and then the cops ran away the moment they saw her.
She wears a steak around her neck to get dogs to play with her.
poor: She runs after the garbage truck with a shopping list!
She goes to KFC to lick people's fingers.
old: She still remembers when these jokes were funny.
When she went to the antique store, they kept her!
When she went to the museum, she saw some of her exes.
